dialogues.text:
Analyzing environment...
Soft surface detected.
Recommended ability: Triller.

The suit has a drilling mode.
When activated, it adapts to the shape
of a rotating cone.

Alright... And how is that transformation useful to
me now exactly?

Impacting soft surfaces with the active ability
allows partial incorporation.

Physical evaluation of the environment indicates...
Directional manipulation possible when entering
these surfaces.

... Is that... serious? I've never experienced
anything like that...

I hope you're as skilled at remembering as you
are at finding rare uses for this suit.
